title: Enhancing Skin Disease Diagnosis: Interpretable Visual Concept Discovery with SAM Empowerment
details: X Hu, J Wang, J Hamm, RR Yotsu, Z Ding - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.09520, 2024
abstract: Current AI-assisted skin image diagnosis has achieved dermatologist-level performance in classifying skin cancer, driven by rapid advancements in deep learning architectures. However, unlike traditional vision tasks, skin images in …
